title: Spacious rental units with two separate private rooms & bathroom for rent each
posting_body: This is a semi basement brand new built unit attached to residential home.
With large living room area for two renters only.
* Located at Morton Grove, IL (13 min drive to O’Hare).
(Great Location, Condition, transport, groceries and more)
(Shared utility bills with tenant who will be renting the other unit available).
-Large open style living room and Kitchen design.
-High speed Internet available for $10 a month.
-As much as we love Pets, sorry no Pets at this time.
-Any gender and background is welcome to rent the unit.
Tenant must be employed and responsible.
Minutes to the park &amp pool, all the shopping on Dempster Rd, close to Metra and between I-94 and I-294.
Conveniently located near grocery stores, banks, and restaurants.
Excellent transportation at your doorstep takes you to O'Hare International Airport and to the City.
For more information please call via provided number 773_Four55-Six652
